Title: Halo: Combat Evolved
Description: The game that started the Halo franchise, a sci-fi first-person shooter.

Title: Fable
Description: An action role-playing game set in a fantasy world where your choices matter.

Title: Crimson Skies: High Road to Revenge
Description: An arcade-style flight game set in an alternate 1930s.

Title: Ninja Gaiden Black
Description: A challenging action-adventure game featuring the ninja Ryu Hayabusa.

Title: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic
Description: A classic Star Wars RPG set thousands of years before the movies.

Title: Jade Empire
Description: An action RPG set in a world inspired by Chinese mythology.

Title: Project Gotham Racing
Description: A stylish street racing game that emphasizes skill over speed.

Title: MechAssault
Description: A fast-paced mech combat game with destructible environments.

Title: Brute Force
Description: A squad-based third-person shooter featuring four distinct characters.

Title: Panzer Dragoon Orta
Description: A visually stunning rail shooter set in a mythical world.

Title: Jet Set Radio Future
Description: A unique action game with cel-shaded graphics and inline skating.

Title: Oddworld: Munch's Oddysee
Description: A quirky 3D platformer set in the Oddworld universe.
